General.Name: LTC Co.Ltd
General.Description: LTC Co.,Ltd provides FPD and semiconductor chemical solutions in Korea and internationally. It offers FPD process chemicals, including copper and aluminum wire strippers, and COT R/W strippers; semiconductor/LED process chemicals, such as polymer removers and PR strippers; and nano chemicals comprising Yttrio-stabilized zirconia, Yttria, and coating slurry. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
